snippet.title: Emberward Trailer (v0.3.4 Early Access)
snippet.description:
🔥Emberward is a roguelite tower defense game, focusing on maze building and unique tower mechanics. 
Play the demo, follow and wishlist the game!!

🚀Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2459550?utm_source=YT
🚩Follow the Dev Progress: https://twitter.com/RefiCHL
